participant_1.background:
I'm going to take a cold shower, then do some gardening.
I love vintage clothing and my home, so I prefer to live in the suburbs.
I like to make things with my hands.
I don't like sports, but I like to watch my brother play.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.

participant_2.background:
I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.
My most valuable possession is the memories I've made gardening with my dad.
my husband is the ceo of taco bell.
My family is full of witty people and we love cats.
I am a unique individual who is comfortable in my own skin.

content.text: Hi! I'm going to take a cold shower, then do some gardening. Do you have any favorite outdoor activities?

Hi there! I love gardening. I couldn't be a school teacher like my dad because I'm blind, but I love spending time outside with plants. My most valuable possession is the memories I've made gardening with my dad.
That's so sweet! My brother plays sports, and I like to watch him play. I don't like sports myself, but I enjoy the competition. I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
My husband is the CEO of Taco Bell, so we have a lot of fun cooking and eating together. We love cats, too. My family is full of witty people and we love to laugh.
That sounds like a great life. I love cats! I'm going to go do some gardening now. It's my favorite way to relax.
Enjoy your gardening! I'm going to go make some tacos
